July 9, 2019
To Hong Kong Police Commissioner,
This is (Your Name). There have been lots of demonstrations and protests in Hong Kong in the recent month. Among many reports, I had learned that one of your fellow officers appeared to challenge the protestors, meeting up with him for a “street fight”.
I am here to ask you to grant the permission for us to meet up for the match “street fight”. I believe his PC badge number is 21304.
Your permission is greatly appreciated.
Sincerely,
(You Name)
